sense.def:
To feel proud
pomeni občutiti veselje in zadovoljstvo zaradi nečesa, kar imamo, kar smo naredili ali s čimer smo povezani.

seg.quote: They seemed proud of what they had accomplished.
It makes me proud to be an American.
He was grinning proudly, delighted with his achievement.

sense.def:
Kdor je
proud
, kaže dostojanstvo in samospoštovanje.

seg.quote: He was a poor but very proud old man.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
proud
opišemo tudi človeka, ki se mu zdi, da je boljši od drugih.

seg.quote: She was too proud to apologize.
